thread.title: Matthew Jarrett
thread.title_full: Mikes Dive Store reviewed by Matthew Jarrett

author: Matthew Jarrett
title: Matthew Jarrett
text:
I have been going to Mike's stores for 30 years, ever since he ran a shop on Chiswick High Road back in the 1980's. I've never needed to go anywhere else since.
For some years he sponsored my old club, London Branch BS-AC, with annual donations of kit in return for us sending customers his way. A wonderful man and much missed.
After all these years, just been there again today to replace my worn out 30-year-old BCD before heading off to the Maldives (again...). An astonishing range of kit, VERY keen prices and superlative service as always. The current owner and staff do Mike's memory very proud...
Matthew Jarrett
